title: Broforce April Update (Compressed)
description:
Broforce April Update, taken from kickass torrents, you will need winrar or a similar program to unzip the folder. Full size once extracted is 311Mb.

Just extract it somewhere and play.


If the "back" button in the options menu doesn't work:

1. Find and enter the saves folder
2. Right click the "options" file 
3. Click properties 
4. Then remove read-only checkbox
5. Click Apply

To change your usermame/language:

1. Change 3DMGAME.ini from read only 
2. Open it in notepad
3. Look for USERNAME: and add whatever name you want
4. Look for Language, change to whatever language the game supports that you want
Alternatively you can press ctrl+f and search for USERNAME or Language.


If you have any problems, comment and ask, I will seed for as long as possible.

PLEASE FOR THE LOVE OF ALL THAT IS GOOD ON THIS SITE, SEED THIS FUCKING TORRENT, UNLIKE THE OTHER BROFORCE TORRENT ON THIS WEBSITE!
